import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function AddMovie() { const [title,setTitle]=useState(''); const [rdate,setRdate]=useState(''); const [link,setLink]=useState(""); const [desc,setDesc]=useState(""); const [genre,setGenre]=useState(''); const [genreid,setGenreid]=useState(''); const [dfname,setDfname]=useState(''); const [dlname,setDlname]=useState(''); const [dgender,setDgender]=useState(''); const [noOfMovies,setnoOfMovies]=useState(''); const [afname,setAfname]=useState(''); const [alname,setAlname]=useState(''); const [agender,setAgender]=useState(''); const [role,setRole]=useState(''); return ( <>
{setTitle(e.target.value)}} autoComplete="title" className="shadow appearance-none border rounded w-full py-2 px-3 text-gray-700 leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outlin" />
